Package ohos.agp.components.listcomponent

Class ListGridLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.LayoutManager
      • ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.ListLayoutManager
        • ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.ListLinearLayoutManager
          • ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.ListGridLayoutManager

  • public class ListGridLayoutManager
extends ListLinearLayoutManager
    功能描述 ListLayoutManager网格布局的实现类。
